# Data download

```{r}

ids <- c("hayleykim97",
         "th-kim310",
         "Lelp27",
         "aputron",
         "gpemelianov",
         "yoo-bh",
         "seokjin-oh",
         "treebird19",
         "jinjulee119")
downpath <- "download/promoter/" 

for (l in ids) {
  try(download.file(paste0("https://github.com/", l,
                           "/researcheweb/raw/main/partdb.xlsx"),
                    paste0("download/promoter/", l, ".xlsx")))
  cat(l, "\n"); flush.console()
  
  rm(l)
}

```


# Data preprocessing

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

files <- paste0(downpath,
                dir(path = downpath, pattern = "*.xlsx$"))

ls_team <- list()
ls_part <- list()
ls_obs <- list()

for (i in 1:length(files)) {
  ls_team[[i]] <- read_excel(files[[i]], sheet = 1)
  ls_part[[i]] <- read_excel(files[[i]], sheet = 2)
  ls_obs[[i]] <- read_excel(files[[i]], sheet = 3)
  
  rm(i)
}


# To make type be the same & bind rows
igem_team <- do.call(bind_rows,
                     lapply(ls_team,
                            function(x) mutate_at(x, .vars = "year", as.character)))

igem_part <- do.call(bind_rows, ls_part)


# Modify the column name
ls_obs <- ls_obs[-1]  # remove wrong a element

ls_obs_mut <- lapply(ls_obs,
                     function(x) mutate_at(x, .vars = "conc", as.numeric))
ls_obs_mut <- lapply(ls_obs_mut,
                     function(x) mutate_at(x, .vars = "incubtemp", as.character))
ls_obs_mut <- lapply(ls_obs_mut,
                     function(x) mutate_at(x, .vars = "id", as.character))
ls_obs_mut <- lapply(ls_obs_mut,
                     function(x) mutate_at(x, .vars = "incubhr", as.character))
igem_obs <- do.call(bind_rows, ls_obs_mut)

```

```{r}
igem_team
igem_part
igem_obs
```
